programme.title: Life in the shadow of Guatemala's Volcano of Fire

programme.title: The Native American kids who get $200k for graduating
programme.desc: The Ho-Chunk Nation are a Native American tribe that owns a string of casinos across Wisconsin. Ho Chunk children get a share of casino profits once they’ve graduated and turned 18.

programme.title: Share
programme.desc: Tim Chau is an 18-year-old Asian-American with more than 4m followers on Instagram. He lives online, grabbing his phone first thing in the morning and even taking baths with it sometimes.

programme.title: Saintmaking: the canonisation of Derek Jarman by queer 'nuns'
programme.desc: This year marks the 30th anniversary of film-maker Derek Jarman’s canonisation by an activist group of gay male 'nuns' known as the Sisters of Perpetual Indulgence.

programme.title: Qandeel
programme.desc: The life, death and impact of Pakistan’s working-class icon Qandeel Baloch, killed in 2016 after becoming a social media celebrity.

programme.title: The Apache war against copper mining: 'this is an act of desecration'
programme.desc: Chí’chil Biłdagoteel - otherwise known as Oak Flat, Arizona – is regarded as sacred ancestral land by the Apache people.

programme.title: I am Alena | Trans actors
programme.desc: There's nothing here for me': transgender and trapped living a half-life in the deep south | Trans actors: 'Why can't you just represent me as a person?'

programme.title: 'Going undiagnosed' due to gender bias | Nuclear Narnia | London's toxic school runs
programme.desc: Thousands of autistic girls and women 'going undiagnosed' due to gender bias | Nuclear Narnia: why is Sellafield Europe's most dangerous industrial site? | London's toxic school runs: how polluted is the air children breathe?

programme.title: Why is anti-immigration sentiment on the rise in Canada?
programme.desc: Canada has long been celebrated for its welcoming stance towards immigrants, fostering a prosperous, multicultural society. But in recent years, rising concerns over living costs and housing shortages have fueled a mounting scepticism of the country’s mass immigration policies.

programme.title: ASMR videos that give YouTube viewers 'head orgasms' | Psychology of queues and how to beat them
programme.desc: The ASMR videos that give YouTube viewers 'head orgasms' | After you: the psychology of queues and how to beat them

programme.title: Lord of the Rain: one man's fight against climate catastrophe
programme.desc: Doyte lives in South Omo, Ethiopia, one of the most remote areas in the world and hard hit by the climate crisis. As Lord of the Rain, it’s Doyte’s job to summon the rains, but for five years they haven’t come.

programme.title: Beyond bionics: how the future of prosthetics is redefining humanity
programme.desc: Bionic technology is removing physical barriers faced by disabled people while raising profound questions of what it is to be human. From DIY prosthetics realised through 3D printing technology to customised AI-driven limbs, science is at the forefront of many life-enhancing innovations

programme.title: The Guardian Cities - Guardian Cities
programme.desc: Guardian Cities: Guardian Tokyo week: Fewer wrestlers, more fans - Sumo at a crossroads | Guardian Tokyo week: Salariman rap battle

programme.title: Anywhere but Westminster
programme.desc: As two-party politics crumbles and the UK continues to fracture, John Harris and John Domokos go in search of the country's real politics, far away from the chatter of the Westminster village.

programme.title: Muhammad Ali | Sucker punch: small town boxing in rural America
programme.desc: Muhammad Ali: 'a personality that transcended his sport' | Sucker punch: small town boxing in rural America is going mainstream - but who benefits?

programme.title: America's soccer migrants: the US footballers crossing Mexico's border
programme.desc: Despite President Donald Trump’s rhetoric about Mexicans crossing the border to the US, American soccer players such as Omar Gonzalez are heading south for new opportunities, more money and a better standard of football.

programme.title: Middle Earth: the fight to save the Amazon's soul | Saving China's songbirds
programme.desc: Middle Earth: the fight to save the Amazon's soul | Uncaged: saving China's songbirds from the poachers' nets

programme.title: Why is big tobacco booming? | Campaign to reclaim children's play space on British streets
programme.desc: We're quitting smoking, so why is big tobacco booming? | Kids v cars: the campaign to reclaim children's play space on British streets

programme.title: Pretty radical: a young woman's journey into the heart of Poland's far right
programme.desc: We follow 19-year-old Paulina, who joins Poland’s far-right National Radical Camp.

programme.title: Inside the strange world of NFTs
programme.desc: Celebrities, sports people, politicians – anyone and everyone seems to be getting into NFTs. These non-fungible tokens (NFTs) have changed the business of buying, selling and owning art and digital property, and 'collectibles' like 'Bored Apes' have sold for millions online.

programme.title: Should we abolish private schools? | The Afghan girls fighting to go to school
programme.desc: Should we abolish private schools? | Banned by the Taliban: the Afghan girls fighting to go to school

programme.title: Burned to the Ground: the Canadian village incinerated by record temperatures
programme.desc: The small village of Lytton in British Columbia hit the global media when it smashed Canada's highest temperature record in June 2021, at 49.6C. Two days later, a wildfire burned the entire village to the ground.

programme.title: Heroin to Holyrood? Man behind 'illegal' drug van runs for Scottish parliament
programme.desc: Peter Krykant, who operates a van in Glasgow where people can safely take illegal drugs, is running for Holyrood as part of a campaign calling for the Scottish government to establish legal sites.

programme.title: The pig superbug and the baby
programme.desc: How did the antibiotic resistant pig superbug LA-MRSA find its way onto the umbilical cords of new born babies in Glasgow - and onto the shelves of our biggest supermarkets.

programme.title: Happy birthday
programme.desc: For years, global music publisher Warner/Chappell claimed copyright of the Happy Birthday song, demanding payment for any public performance of it.

programme.title: The UK's first professional trans choir: 'It's a joyful act of resistance'
programme.desc: Anil Sebastian and Coda Galabov are the creators of a new choir called Trans Voices, which offers a space for trans and non-binary people who have felt unable to sing with their true voices in traditional choirs.

programme.title: Marielle and Monica: the LGBT activists resisting Bolsonaro's Brazil
programme.desc: The LGBT activists resisting Bolsonaro's Brazil. Marielle Franco, a Brazilian LGBT and human rights activist, was killed in March 2018.

programme.title: Juste Debout | Stik in Shoreditch
programme.desc: Juste Debout: the world's biggest street-dance competition | Stik in Shoreditch: the artist’s hidden tribute to a sold-off London

programme.title: No ball games: life and play through the eyes of children across the UK
programme.desc: Celebrating the imagination and resourcefulness of young children across the UK by understanding the outdoor games they invent, inherit and play.

programme.title: Is this inclusive? Why only 4% of children's book heroes are BAME
programme.desc: More than 33% of students at UK schools are from black and minority ethnic backgrounds, but only 4% of the protagonists in children's books in the UK are BAME.

programme.title: Behind the scenes of Seahorse documentary | If I die on Mars
programme.desc: If all men got pregnant, it'd be taken more seriously': behind the scenes of Seahorse | If I die on Mars: meet the people on a mission to be first on the red planet ... and stay there

programme.title: Ireland's forgotten mixed-race child abuse victims
programme.desc: Rosemary Adaser was one of many mixed-race children considered illegitimate who was brought up in institutions run by the Catholic church in Ireland between the 1950s and 1970s.

programme.title: United Voices
programme.desc: As work in the UK gets more precarious and the gig economy booms, trade unionism is being reimagined and people from a wide range of backgrounds are joining new kinds of unions, often for the first time.

programme.title: The Things We Don't Say: children of the Rwandan genocide
programme.desc: A group of young adults born during or just after the 1994 genocide against Rwanda's Tutsi people gather to find the courage to break a powerful taboo.

programme.title: Black Pete | Comedy theatre about life in the Calais refugee camp
programme.desc: Black Pete: Why is the Dutch blackface tradition still going strong? | I don't want any more sadness in my life - comedy theatre about life in the Calais refugee camp

programme.title: Malcolm Gladwell in conversation with Ben Fountain | Stewart Lee in conversation with Alan Moore
programme.desc: Malcolm Gladwell in conversation with Ben Fountain | 'I'll write as if I'm trying to get sacked': Stewart Lee in conversation with Alan Moore

programme.title: Is algorave the future of dance music? | Wet plate collodion photography
programme.desc: Run the code: is algorave the future of dance music? | The black art: wet plate collodion photography

programme.title: Super Dogs | The remarkable urban photographs of David Levene
programme.desc: Super dogs: the race to win America’s most famous dog show | City: the remarkable urban photographs of David Levene

programme.title: David Bowie remembered by two of his biggest fans | Free improvisation in underground music
programme.desc: David Bowie remembered by two of his biggest fans | Free improvisation: still the ultimate in underground music?

programme.title: Somali Night Fever
programme.desc: In the 1970s and 80s Mogadishu's airwaves were filled with Somali funk, disco, soul and reggae.

programme.title: Pitching up
programme.desc: How Ireland’s ancient sports are helping to integrate children in the country's most ethnically diverse town.

programme.title: Women smash Catholic taboos in the Philippines | Fake babies, real love | Crisanto Street
programme.desc: At 11 years old, they're getting pregnant: women smash Catholic taboos in the Philippines | Fake babies, real love: the women who care for lifelike baby dolls | Crisanto Street

programme.title: Gay, black and HIV positive: America's hidden epidemic
programme.desc: If you are a black, gay man in America, your risk of contracting HIV is one in two. Leah Green travels to Atlanta, Georgia, which has the largest gay and black community in the country. She finds out how stigma, education and structural racism continue to feed into this startling statistic

programme.title: Off The Page
programme.desc: Britain Isn't Eating | Groove is in the Heart | Death of England

programme.title: Death land
programme.desc: The people on a mission to live for ever | Before I die: a day with terminally ill patients

programme.title: On the Ground
programme.desc: The fake news divide: how Modi's rule is fracturing India | Is a new opioid crisis about to devastate the UK? | 'Little Gaza’: Inside the fight for the West Bank

programme.title: The Guardian Cities - The artist and their city
programme.desc: The artist and their city: Ai Weiwei on Beijing: 'It's a prison for freedom of speech' | Antony Gormley: 'London is bought, developed and abandoned'

programme.title: Five minute masterminds
programme.desc: Leading experts of their field discuss their latest research and explain how it will impact us all

programme.title: Uighur teacher describes forced sterilisation | A survivor recalls India's violent partition
programme.desc: 'The memories never leave me': Uighur teacher describes forced sterilisation | My mother was beheaded in front of me': a survivor recalls India's violent partition

programme.title: Anonymous Comes to Town
programme.desc: The sleepy rustbelt town of Steubenville, Ohio, was once best known for high school sports and as the birthplace of Dean Martin.

programme.title: I changed Tunisia's history. I regret it all now | How Gaza deals with urban destruction
programme.desc: I changed Tunisia's history. I regret it all now | Even the firehoses leak: how Gaza deals with urban destruction

programme.title: Old Lesbians
programme.desc: From first crush to first love, from the closet to coming out and from loss to connection. For the last 25 years, retired schoolteacher Arden Eversmeyer travelled from Houston across the US to record hundreds of oral 'herstories' from a rapidly disappearing population.

programme.title: The internet warriors
programme.desc: Who are the people that get so angry online? Meet the internet warriors, in their own homes.

programme.title: The Trial
programme.desc: Alka Pradhan, James Connell and Sterling Thomas are lawyers for Ammar al-Baluchi, one of five men facing the death penalty for plotting the 2001 terror attacks in the US.

programme.title: Ireland's forgotten mixed-race child abuse victims
programme.desc: Rosemary Adaser was one of many mixed-race children considered illegitimate who was brought up in institutions run by the Catholic church in Ireland between the 1950s and 1970s.

programme.title: Is this inclusive? Why only 4% of children's book heroes are BAME
programme.desc: More than 33% of students at UK schools are from black and minority ethnic backgrounds, but only 4% of the protagonists in children's books in the UK are BAME.

programme.title: How a community fought the Louisiana floods | How algorithms are cutting Americans' healthcare
programme.desc: The Cajun Army: how a community fought the Louisiana floods | Automating Care: How algorithms are cutting Americans' healthcare

programme.title: Share
programme.desc: Tim Chau is an 18-year-old Asian-American with more than 4m followers on Instagram. He lives online, grabbing his phone first thing in the morning and even taking baths with it sometimes.

programme.title: Lives Instead of Knives: one woman's struggle to end knife crime
programme.desc: Smith's Farm Estate in Northolt, north-west London, has been the scene of multiple stabbings. After one murder came particularly close to home, community volunteer Jen Lock began a one-woman mission to end knife crime in the area. But, as she finds out, things don’t always go smoothly.

programme.title: Guantánamo Diary | The quest for the perfect male six-packs
programme.desc: Guantánamo Diary: rendition, torture and detention without charge | Steroids, syringes and stigma: the quest for the perfect male six-packs

programme.title: Teranga: the migrant-run Afrobeat nightclub uniting Naples
programme.desc: Fata and Yankuba are two young Gambians with ambitious dreams, who fled dictatorship and poverty and landed in Naples, only to discover a new kind of violence: a pernicious climate of racism and an unhelpful immigration system.

programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on China’s rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. programme.title: Leaders Talk

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already "living in the future"!

programme.title: The Hub With Wang Guan
programme.desc: The Hub with Wang Guan covers hot-button geopolitical and economic issues, as well as interesting stories and trends in culture, education, technology and lifestyle. programme.title: The Vibe

programme.title: Humanities and Geography
programme.desc: A strand devoted to the nature and wildlife of China, the people who lived alongside them, and the great and diverse landscapes with which they all contend.

programme.title: Living China
programme.desc: Real life stories told from the personal perspective. Moving, dramatic, sorrows and joys, expressed emphatically and expressed quietly. Watch closely to see and understand the real China as it is lived.

programme.title: Special Edition
programme.desc: Prestige Chinese documentary production, tackling serious subjects with the best cinematography, editing, and all round production values with a unique Chinese perspective.

programme.title: Journeys and Discoveries
programme.desc: A documentary series showcasing the history of China and its people.

programme.title: History in the Frame
programme.desc: A documentary series featuring historical and archaeological exploration.

programme.title: Best Eats
programme.desc: Food connects people! A feast for the eyes that spotlights the cuisines of China in a way that’s bound to set the mouths of the whole globe watering!

programme.title: Youthful China
programme.desc: The youth of a country is the future of that country. A series of documentaries focusing on the younger generation of China in which you get to see what they are achieving and what makes them tick!

programme.title: Pixel Collage
programme.desc: A well-crafted collage of selected short documentaries telling stories about all aspects of China! People, technology, culture, and wildlife, all are showcased in Internet-friendly form.

programme.title: Gruchoty - reaktywacja
programme.desc: Zespół znajduje najgorszy egzemplarz MG F w całej Wielkiej Brytanii. Z silnika wyciekają płyny, tapicerka jest zniszczona: szybko okazuje się, że auto nie bez powodu było takie tanie...

programme.title: Gruchoty - reaktywacja
programme.desc: Podobają ci się klasyczne fiaty, ale legendarna pięćsetka jest poza twoim zasięgiem? Kup fiata 126! Egzemplarz, który znajdują Will i Gus jest wolny od rdzy, ale fatalnie jeździ...

programme.title: Nefrytowa gorączka
programme.desc: Gary i syn ratują starą, wojskową ciężarówkę, ale okazuje się, że jazda nią do kopalni jest wyjątkowo trudna. Scrappy Larry myśli, że przyczepa rozwiąże jego problemy.

programme.title: Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii
programme.sub-title: S06 : E10 Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii S6 Ep10
programme.desc: Nick i Jo pomagają przetransportować samolot z czasów wojny. Opóźniony lot do miasteczka na odludziu oznacza, że mobilna klinika kardiologiczna pozostanie bez lekarza.

programme.title: Górscy cieśle
programme.desc: Curzelowie przygotowują się do zimy, szykując wyposażenie wnętrza dla schroniska Brentei. Czy uda im się zakończyć wszystkie prace i udostępnić budynek turystom?

programme.title: Australijscy poławiacze homarów
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Australijscy poławiacze homarów S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Nowicjusz Steve Hursey dokonuje pierwszego zimowego połowu; w restauracji należącej do jego rodziny kończą się zapasy homarów, a Steve ma temu zaradzić.

programme.title: Oko w oko z potworami
programme.desc: Zainspirowany postacią starca ze słynnej powieści Ernesta Hemingwaya „Stary człowiek i morze" Cyril próbuje łowić ryby z małej łodzi, ręcznie nawijając żyłkę.

programme.title: Gruchoty - reaktywacja
programme.desc: Podobają ci się klasyczne fiaty, ale legendarna pięćsetka jest poza twoim zasięgiem? Kup fiata 126! Egzemplarz, który znajdują Will i Gus jest wolny od rdzy, ale fatalnie jeździ...

programme.title: Największe pomyłki inżynierów
programme.desc: Pożar w fabryce nawozów sztucznych grozi zniszczeniem całego miasta Winston-Salem w Karolinie Północnej; eksperci badają przestarzały drewniany magazyn, w którym składowano wybuchowe chemikalia.

programme.title: Nefrytowa gorączka
programme.desc: Gary i syn ratują starą, wojskową ciężarówkę, ale okazuje się, że jazda nią do kopalni jest wyjątkowo trudna. Scrappy Larry myśli, że przyczepa rozwiąże jego problemy.

programme.title: Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii
programme.sub-title: S06 : E10 Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii S6 Ep10
programme.desc: Nick i Jo pomagają przetransportować samolot z czasów wojny. Opóźniony lot do miasteczka na odludziu oznacza, że mobilna klinika kardiologiczna pozostanie bez lekarza.

programme.title: Górscy cieśle
programme.desc: Curzelowie przygotowują się do zimy, szykując wyposażenie wnętrza dla schroniska Brentei. Czy uda im się zakończyć wszystkie prace i udostępnić budynek turystom?

programme.title: Australijscy poławiacze homarów
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Australijscy poławiacze homarów S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Nowicjusz Steve Hursey dokonuje pierwszego zimowego połowu; w restauracji należącej do jego rodziny kończą się zapasy homarów, a Steve ma temu zaradzić.

programme.title: Oko w oko z potworami
programme.desc: Północna Kanada to kraj Indian Cree i olbrzymich wodnych bestii. Cyril przybył tu z misją złapania jednej z najbardziej agresywnych ryb na świecie.

programme.title: Gruchoty - reaktywacja
programme.desc: Triumph herald to świetny klasyk dla początkujących; ten egzemplarz miał dwóch właścicieli i przejechał 50 tys. mil, ale stoi w stodole. Remontu wymagają silnik, hamulce i skrzynia biegów.

programme.title: Nefrytowa gorączka
programme.desc: Na błotnistych drogach Garon i Josh tracą kontrolę nad ciężarówką znaną jako „sześciopak". Ekipa dokonuje pierwszego cięcia z soczewki skalnej J, a Rick targuje się, sprzedając ładunek baterii.

programme.title: Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii
programme.sub-title: S06 : E11 Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii S6 Ep11
programme.desc: Nick i Jo kontynuują walkę o uratowanie bombowca z czasów II wojny światowej z buszu na zachodzie Australii. Kelly musi przetransportować 40 ton winogron do wytwórni win, zanim zaczną fermentować.

programme.title: Górscy cieśle
programme.desc: Sezon zaczyna się od trudnego zadania: renowacji campingu „Buffa di Perrero" na Monte Cristallo we współpracy z żołnierzami z Szóstego Pułku Alpejskiego z Bruneck. Pogoda nie ułatwia pracy...

programme.title: Australijscy poławiacze homarów
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Australijscy poławiacze homarów S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Załoga kutra Bold Contender zmierza w stronę Pedra Blanca, miejsca słynącego z ogromnych fal. Niewielu poławiaczy homarów zapuszcza się w te trudne i niebezpieczne rejony.

programme.title: Największe pomyłki inżynierów
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 Największe pomyłki inżynierów S6 Ep1
programme.desc: W Kalifornii wali się ważny most. Pożar kasyna w Las Vegas wymusza ogromną akcję ratunkową. Co doprowadziło do tragedii w jednym z najszybszych pociągów pasażerskich na świecie w Niemczech?

programme.title: Nefrytowa gorączka
programme.desc: Na błotnistych drogach Garon i Josh tracą kontrolę nad ciężarówką znaną jako „sześciopak". Ekipa dokonuje pierwszego cięcia z soczewki skalnej J, a Rick targuje się, sprzedając ładunek baterii.

programme.title: Oko w oko z potworami
programme.desc: W ciągu ostatnich 50 lat na teren Everglades na Florydzie wprowadzono wiele egzotycznych gatunków zwierząt. Aby je wytropić, Cyril musi najpierw zdobyć zaufanie miejscowych i przejść ich testy.

programme.title: Gruchoty - reaktywacja
programme.desc: Mini to dobry i popularny samochód, ale ten egzemplarz przegrzewa się. Will i Gus kupili go na eBayu za jedyne 600 funtów — i to jest właściwa cena, ale samochód wymaga dużo pracy...

programme.title: Nefrytowa gorączka
programme.desc: Jedyna koparka ekipy staje w ogniu; brakująca część opóźnia wiercenie — Justin przylatuje z dwoma piłami linowymi i szybko traci zimną krew, próbując je ustawić.

programme.title: Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii
programme.sub-title: S06 : E12 Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii S6 Ep12
programme.desc: Deszcz przeszkadza Robbiemu w przewiezieniu domu na Gold Coast. Graham zmaga się z burzami i pożarami trawy, przewożąc szyny kolejowe na odległość 5000 kilometrów w ciągu zaledwie pięciu dni.

programme.title: Górscy cieśle
programme.desc: Zaczynają się prace remontowe na Monte Cristallo — Giovanni i Paolo muszą stawić czoła wyzwaniom logistycznym; z pomocą innego zespołu stolarskiego ścigają się z czasem, aby przygotować materiały.

programme.title: Australijscy poławiacze homarów
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Australijscy poławiacze homarów S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Życie na morzu bywa bardzo samotne — zwłaszcza kiedy jesteś poławiaczem homarów. Kapitan Squizzy i Deckie Tabor wracają z pustymi ładowniami, bo na morzu pojawiły się tajemnicze iskrzyłudy.

programme.title: Największe pomyłki inżynierów
programme.sub-title: S06 : E02 Największe pomyłki inżynierów S6 Ep2
programme.desc: Wiejska droga w Wielkiej Brytanii zostaje zniszczona w tajemniczy sposób. Słynny teleskop w Portoryko wali się na ziemię. Co spowodowało zawalenie się wieżowca w stanie Wirginia?

programme.title: Nefrytowa gorączka
programme.desc: Jedyna koparka ekipy staje w ogniu; brakująca część opóźnia wiercenie — Justin przylatuje z dwoma piłami linowymi i szybko traci zimną krew, próbując je ustawić.

programme.title: Australijscy poławiacze homarów
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Australijscy poławiacze homarów S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Życie na morzu bywa bardzo samotne — zwłaszcza kiedy jesteś poławiaczem homarów. Kapitan Squizzy i Deckie Tabor wracają z pustymi ładowniami, bo na morzu pojawiły się tajemnicze iskrzyłudy.

programme.title: Oko w oko z potworami
programme.desc: Gigantyczna płaszczka słodkowodna jest prawdopodobnie największą słodkowodną rybą na naszej planecie. Cyril zbiera jad z kolców ogonowych płaszczek, aby pomóc w opracowaniu antidotum.

programme.title: Gruchoty - reaktywacja
programme.desc: Rolls Royce to marka kojarzona z luksusem i wyjątkowym charakterem — ale egzemplarz znaleziony w Yorkshire zupełnie nie pasuje do tych wyobrażeń. Wygląda okropnie, ale jest tani: warto zaryzykować?

programme.title: Nefrytowa gorączka
programme.desc: Wczesne opady śniegu opóźniają wydobycie; załoga próbuje uruchomić piłę linową, aby wydobyć kawałek 18-metrowej soczewki skalnej. Claudia zastępuje chorego Gary'ego.

programme.title: Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii
programme.sub-title: S06 : E13 Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii S6 Ep13
programme.desc: Michael przewozi niebezpieczne chemikalia do kopalni na pustyni — ale zagraża mu cyklon nad Terytorium Północnym. Lindsay, kierowca z Tasmanii, wiezie 80 tys. wściekłych pszczół do lasu deszczowego.

programme.title: Górscy cieśle
programme.desc: Kiedy prace są już bliskie ukończenia, Curzelowie stają przed najtrudniejszą częścią zadania; kontynuują renowację, wspierani przez przybyłe na miejsce posiłki. Wszyscy mają wspólny cel!

programme.title: Australijscy poławiacze homarów
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Australijscy poławiacze homarów S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Załoga kutra Ella Rose łowi homary nieopodal Three Hummock Island na północ od Tasmanii. Złapali już największego homara tego sezonu — olbrzyma ważącego 3,8 kg — ale nie zamierzają na tym poprzestać.

programme.title: Największe pomyłki inżynierów
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 Największe pomyłki inżynierów S6 Ep3
programme.desc: Gigantyczny żuraw wieżowy wali się na dwie przecznice domów na Manhattanie. Historycznemu mostowi w Pensylwanii grozi zawalenie. Co spowodowało przerwanie potężnej zapory wodnej w Idaho?

programme.title: Nefrytowa gorączka
programme.desc: Wczesne opady śniegu opóźniają wydobycie; załoga próbuje uruchomić piłę linową, aby wydobyć kawałek 18-metrowej soczewki skalnej. Claudia zastępuje chorego Gary'ego.

programme.title: Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii
programme.sub-title: S06 : E13 Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii S6 Ep13
programme.desc: Michael przewozi niebezpieczne chemikalia do kopalni na pustyni — ale zagraża mu cyklon nad Terytorium Północnym. Lindsay, kierowca z Tasmanii, wiezie 80 tys. wściekłych pszczół do lasu deszczowego.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Storm Hunters | Too Close for Comfort
programme.desc: Another chase through the hotbed of wicked weather puts the storm hunters a little too close to the danger zone. Will Mark & Jaclyn see the tornado they’re hoping for before it’s too late?

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Storm Hunters | Into the Core
programme.desc: One year after witnessing a record number of deadly twisters in Tornado Alley, Mark & Jaclyn return to the Midwest in search of more extreme storms. The hunt challenges their relationship with Mother Nature, as well as with each other.

programme.title: Captured: Extreme Weather
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Captured: Extreme Weather | Fire & Water
programme.desc: A narrow escape from a raging wildfire – a dramatic encounter with a mudslide - the jaw-dropping images of a flash flood – just some of the encounters with two of nature’s most destructive forces caught on camera in this Fire and Water episode.

programme.title: Captured: Extreme Weather
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Captured: Extreme Weather | Super El Niño
programme.desc: El Niño is a temperature anomaly in the Pacific Ocean that affects weather patterns around the globe. In this episode we show some of the costly and deadly weather that can result when a Super El Niño occurs.

programme.title: Captured: Extreme Weather
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Captured: Extreme Weather | Tornadoes
programme.desc: Tornadoes; they are the embodiment of severe weather. In this episode we show some of the most terrifying weather caught on camera; from surviving a direct hit to a tornado in a typhoon.

programme.title: Captured: Extreme Weather
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Captured: Extreme Weather | Power of Water
programme.desc: Humans are inclined to take the natural element of water for granted; until they witness its relentless power and destructive capabilities.

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Extreme Weather Countdown | Dust Devils in the Wind
programme.desc: Weather is an unrelenting force, tearing through our lives and homes, with no regard for the human condition. But lucky for us, these humans have been conditioned to take out their phones and record whatever is happening, letting us relive the experiences again and again. And when it comes to weather that is out of the ordinary, that's truly where we come alive. Strap in, because you're about to get hit by an Extreme Weather Countdown.

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Extreme Weather Countdown | What the Hail?

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Storm Hunters | Knowing the Enemy
programme.desc: Jaclyn Whittal and Mark Robinson are in Tornado Alley to track down some of the most ferocious weather.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Storm Hunters | Too Close for Comfort

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Storm Hunters | Into the Core
programme.desc: One year after witnessing a record number of deadly twisters in Tornado Alley, Mark & Jaclyn return to the Midwest in search of more extreme storms. The hunt challenges their relationship with Mother Nature, as well as with each other.

programme.title: Captured: Extreme Weather
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Captured: Extreme Weather | Fire & Water
programme.desc: A narrow escape from a raging wildfire – a dramatic encounter with a mudslide - the jaw-dropping images of a flash flood – just some of the encounters with two of nature’s most destructive forces caught on camera in this Fire and Water episode.

programme.title: Captured: Extreme Weather
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Captured: Extreme Weather | Super El Niño
programme.desc: El Niño is a temperature anomaly in the Pacific Ocean that affects weather patterns around the globe. In this episode we show some of the costly and deadly weather that can result when a Super El Niño occurs.

programme.title: Captured: Extreme Weather
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Captured: Extreme Weather | Tornadoes
programme.desc: Tornadoes; they are the embodiment of severe weather. In this episode we show some of the most terrifying weather caught on camera; from surviving a direct hit to a tornado in a typhoon.

programme.title: Captured: Extreme Weather
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Captured: Extreme Weather | Power of Water
programme.desc: Humans are inclined to take the natural element of water for granted; until they witness its relentless power and destructive capabilities.

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Extreme Weather Countdown | Dust Devils in the Wind
programme.desc: Weather is an unrelenting force, tearing through our lives and homes, with no regard for the human condition. But lucky for us, these humans have been conditioned to take out their phones and record whatever is happening, letting us relive the experiences again and again. And when it comes to weather that is out of the ordinary, that's truly where we come alive. Strap in, because you're about to get hit by an Extreme Weather Countdown.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Storm Hunters | Heartache & Hope
programme.desc: It’s an ordinary town with a history of heartache. No one knows why Moore, Oklahoma has been the target of 3 mega-tornadoes in just 16 years. On the heels of the May 20, 2013 EF5 tornado, Mark & Jaclyn uncover stories behind the disaster, the recovery and the tenacious spirit of the people of the US Midwest.

programme.title: Storm Hunters

programme.desc: On his home turf in Canada, Mark and his team chase one of nature’s deadliest forces, coming face to face with tornadoes’ shear strength.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Storm Hunters | Best of
programme.desc: From hailstorms to hurricanes and tornadoes, the Storm Hunters revisit their craziest chases and share some of the most amazing moments in extreme weather events.
